data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Barpeta, Assam, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Barpeta, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Barpeta, Assam, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Barpeta hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Barpeta.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Darjee people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, let it be said of the 1,674,970 lost in Barpeta that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Barpeta unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Barpeta, Assam, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

location.name: Barpeta
